reviews.review: One of the best games I've ever played. The puzzle, the story and the comedy... Ah! The sarcasm... Well, it's worth every penny. If you have a friend to play with, you both should've already bought the game instead of being reading the reviews. Buy it already! Who knows a Portal 3 might come one day if you buy it now...
one of the best games of all time
this game is very fun. The single player mode having an amazing story

You have to think with portals.
way better than the first one with a much greater sense of scale and depth with the staple portal humor that's possibly funnier here than in the original.

This game is absoloutly AMAZING!!! This game is at a reasonable price, definatley recommend it. The graphics are amazing, the way cooperative trailer was created (co-op is amazing too). This game made me laugh even though i dont have the best humour out there.

(THIS REVIEW WAS STOLEN FROM MY FRIEND :)

An amazingly crafted game with noticeable love and care put into each level. The physics and mechanics are amazing and the game beats the first one in almost every respect. Now please give us Portal 3
aged a little since 2011 but this game is cool especially with a friend
Brilliant game. Hurts my head sometime but it is all great fun when you figure out what to do. And ofc, lots of fun secrets

Comprai questo gioco 6 anni fa, e mi piacque tantissimo. Ancora oggi non l'ho mai abbandonato e rigiocarlo pi√π e pi√π volte non stanca mai. consigliato se piacciono i puzzle game e le trame molto avvincenti.

Quality title! Extremely well written, fun to play (especially with loved ones~), and with a lot of personality to keep the momentum going. Absolutely worth the buy, and completing either story mode or co-op mode at least once.
Aboslutley amazing game i give 1 elephant/10 points
Fun to play with more levels than 1st part.

Great Puzzles
Hilarious
Good Story
Masterpiece of a Game
There are a lot of loading screens, but even so it's absolutely worth it. The graphics stand up, and the gameplay is always fun. A must play for every gamer.

this game is awsome and even when i completed the main story i could play the other tests with friends and even when i did those there is an endless amount of fun chalenging player created tests for 1 or 2 players

This game is hilarious. I love it so much, just the humor and everything about it. The campaign is amazing and I highly reccomend it. You dont really need to play Portal 1 to understand it but if you know what happens in that game well its probably for the better. Amazing character development, amazing humor and amazing overall. 
Highly reccomended 10/10
What a game. Captivating, fun, intriguing and overall a good experience. *I'm in space*
A step up in regarding every aspect as compared to Portal. A must play for anyone who's liked the first game.
me ha gustado todo, excelente juego, saquen la tercera parte pedazos de mierda
Truly one of the greatest games of all time.
HOLY SHIT AND I THOUGHT THE FIRST ONE WAS GOOD
Mientras que el primero fue un juego bueno, la secuela es incre√≠ble! y mas con el modo cooperativo. Absolutamente recomendado!

One of the greatest sequels ever made, and a rare example of a sequel that SURPASSES the original. Hilariously-written villains (and dialogue in general), level design somehow even better than the original, terrific co-op, and perfect mod support. Sits proudly among my favorite games of all time.
Great mechanics, surprisingly well fleshed out story, great evil sarcastic AI and some very unexpected plot twists. Whats not to like. Just buy it.
Great game everyone should play at leaste once even though im a bit late

It is a great puzzle game that makes you think pretty hard while still making you feel good about yourself. Valve has done a wonderful job with the writing of it. It is hilarious yet still has a captivating story.
If you liked the first one, give this one a shot. Also co op mode is a big plus
Parfait meme presque 10 ans apres sa sortie

It's Portal 2 why are you reading a review this is one of those games that just needs to come standard with every digital machine
ok so this game is awesome, over 150 hours of fun and testing for me. go back to the old test chambers, play new test chambers, or even play old test chambers that are new to this game!
its a good continuation of the first portal.

This is a classic first-person puzzle game. If you're into puzzle-platforming, you must play Portal, both 1 and 2. Also look into Portal Stories: Mel, a free mod for Portal 2, it's as good as Portal 2, but much harder.

This game was a much better game than the first game. However, i enjoyed both of them. Portal 2 is my favorite out of the two because it has more story and its much lengthier. Plus, Co-op mode with my friends is amazing because its so much fun to just mess around and have fun. VALVe did a very nice job on this game and it deserved all the praise it got. Good work VALVe, keep making good content.
If you would like to torture your brain buy this.
Game is awesome! Played it back on Xbox 360 and had to pick it up on Steam because I got a gaming PC. Super fun and addictive. Very unique game play!
This is absolutely my favorite game of all time. If you haven't played it there is absolutely no reason to pass up this classic.
Lo unico malo del juego es que no lo puedo volver a jugar por primera vez
